column3: News;Phnom Penh: A fire broke out at 8:15 pm on May 4
column4: 2019 in a building near Bak Touk High School
column9: smoke was seen coming from the 7th floor of LBP Micro Finance Institution. Firefighters intervened and had the situation under control by 9:50 pm.------The cause of fire is reported to have been an electrical fault.------The damage to the building is unknown
column10: because the business owner has not given any information to the press.------https://postnews.com.kh/local/437606
